attributes.review: I got this app to stay informed on everything that is happening with COVID-19 and BLM but this app took a whole HOUR to download after it was downloaded I went on it and KABLAM my phone crashed not only is it terribly constructed it also has a VIRUS 👿👿👿👿👿👿👿👿👿☠️😔😔😒😒😒😒😞😞😞😞😩😩😩😩😩😭😭😭😭😤😤😤😤🤬🤬🤬🤬😡😡😡

attributes.review: I was under the impression it was an only fans for Barron Trump and I was very disappointed to say the least when I open the app up zero stars if I could but sadly only one
attributes.title: Very disappointing

attributes.review: i was totally excited to check out the app mr cheeto designed!! i’m such a big fan so i had high hopes😍😍unfortunately it took almost a week to download onto my phone #sad😿after the weekly holdup, it finally downloaded and i was totally pumped!!😘😎i logged in and then it told me i had to pay 1,000 dollars to access the app🙀total bummer for me seeing i just spent 2,000 on his merch a few days ago🤓i decided it was a cost i was willing to pay tho🤑the next thing the app showed me was an add for his tanner but seeing as i didn’t want to look like a cheeto, i decided to ex out but it wouldn’t go away. then my phone started glitching and i just saw trump 2020 everywhere🤨then i thought it was back to normal but then i noticed all my emojis were replaced by TRUMPS FACE😒i rly like emojis as a way to express myself so i found this extremely disappointing😫. thankfully i decided this app wasn’t for me so i deleted it. my emojis went back to normal but unfortunately i still get calls telling me to re download the app. ugh as if!😤anyways biden 2020✨💋💅🏻
